feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Quick Fix for uploading, confusing instagram
New release for Postiz: Hot fixes for empty avatar, analytics, and package-lock problems
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • avatar fix by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/433
  • sync package lock by @brody192 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/440
  • Fix analytics to be end of day by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/441

New Contributors

  • @brody192 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/440

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.11...v1.6.12

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Added stories and collaborators to instagram, fixed Linkedin cutoff, date for people in america
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Rename old TWITTER_CLIENT_ID(and SECRET) to new X_CLIENT_ID naming convention by @honzapatCZ in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/430
  • bugfix: The teams component, remove button, was not visible in light mode by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/429
  • bugfix: Component property needs braces by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/456
  • [FEAT] change dates to the American people #156 by @Aspireve in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/461
  • instagram stories, add collaborators, infrastructure for settings in validation by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/468

New Contributors

  • @honzapatCZ made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/430
  • @Aspireve made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/461

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.12...v1.7.12
